Abstract Façade class. The Façade is responsible for initializing in order:
  • Event-Signals
  • Model-Proxies
  • App states collection
  • Controller-Commands
  • and View-Mediators.
Facade initializes the main parts of the application (model, view, controller) and provides a main access point for them. Acting as a binding component it allows to separate the model from the view, thus separating data from UI elements respectively.

Constructor

new()

Signal that's dispatched when facade.start is called
